Sentences: Mi bin a go market yestadeh fuh buy mango.
Shi a cook rice an’ peas now.
Dem gwine a beach tomorrow wid de whole family.

De book get read by de teacher inna class.
Mi cyaan find mi key dem nowhere.
Ef yuh tink it easy, try do it yuhself.
Mi wudda neva seh dat ef mi did hear proper.

Wha’ yuh up to dis mawnin’?

Yuh hear ’bout de party las’ night?
No man, mi did stay home, mi head bin a hurt.
Gyal, yuh dress look nice today!
Mi cyaan believe he seh dat to she.
We gwan meet up later a de square?
Mi hungry, leh we grab suppm fuh eat.
Dem children noisy, eh? Whole day a mek noise.
Mi go check pon Granny yesterday, she good.
Mi nah go school today, mi got a Zoom class instead.
Yuh done see di deadline move to Friday?
She tell me, ‘Aye, you better do dat now, oui!’
Mi cyaan memba di password, but mi try again.
Dem seh di meeting cancel, check yuh email.
Mi ha’ homework but mi waan chill lil bit.
‘Bonjou,’ mi teacher say, an’ den start de class.
Mi jus’ text she, she nuh reply yet.
Di lil bwoy ask mi, ‘Ki jan ou ye?’
Mi write de essay in Word, den mi upload it.

Q: Wha time de bus come? A: Round 8:15 sharp.

Q: Mi deh pon speaker? A: Nah, yuh safe.
